:py:mod:`napi.data.report`
==========================

.. py:module:: napi.data.report

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Module for easy report generation and data summary.



Module Contents
---------------

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   napi.data.report.Report




.. py:class:: Report


   Collection of report generating methods.

   .. py:method:: generate(layout, level='summary', tags=['subject'])
      :staticmethod:

      Generate report for a layout.


   .. py:method:: generate_for_dataset(dataset)
      :staticmethod:

      Generate report for a dataset.
